title: Account Compromised
body: I submitted a ticket, (idk how I'm still logged in on boards) but all my information has been changed. I cannot login to game, and when I reset password it does not got to my registered email, I saw an email in my trash bin (will provide screenshot) that I did not put there, meaning someone obtained my email as well. I have reset my email password, and am waiting on a reply from Riot.

replies.body: Not trying to spam this thread, but I just wanted to add that I cannot check the ticket that was sent to my email because my password is changed.

> [{quoted}](name=BlazzedElmo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TdUaVIB3,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-10-15T01:59:40.371+0000)
>
> Not trying to spam this thread, but I just wanted to add that I cannot check the ticket that was sent to my email because my password is changed.

You don't have to be signed into the ticket center to view your ticket.  You can use another email that you do have access to, and any response received from support would be sent in both ticket and email form.  You'll be able to reply to the email to continue correspondence!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TdUaVIB3,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-10-15T17:23:37.299+0000)
>
> You don't have to be signed into the ticket center to view your ticket.  You can use another email that you do have access to, and any response received from support would be sent in both ticket and email form.  You'll be able to reply to the email to continue correspondence!

How long does it generally take for me to get a response been over 24 hours, and I'm just trying to get my account back.

the same thing just happen to me today but I never got email.
pls help riot

Also since I am still logged into my account, I went into setteings on the boards here and the verified email is not my email!

http://imgur.com/8kjqJum
Ok,I will look at the account protection guide to be more secure and thank you for the response. Hope to hear back soon!

Don't worry, we're happy to help and get your account back on its feet.  I'm glad you were able to secure your email, but I also recommend visiting our [account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide for some safety steps in and outside of League.   Looking into this for you, I do see you have a few tickets open on this.  Keep in mind that one will likely be closed to prevent confusion or delays in responding.  The ticket was escalated to be reviewed by our account team, who will respond as soon as possible!
